title: Cliff Stearns
deleted: Like every other member of Congress, Stearns held town meetings and conducted nearly 560 of these events.  In addition, he held over 40 tele-town halls.

title: Cliff Stearns
deleted: Mr. Stearns recently published his first book entitled ‘Life in the Marble Palace: In Praise of Folly’ which gives an insider’s look into the ‘belly’ of American politics. His book identifies the Legislative Branch weak points and offers his analysis on the current system-what works, what doesn’t and what needs to be done.<ref>{{Cite web|url=http://www.cliffordstearns.com/|title=Cliff Stearns - Home|website=Clifford B. Stearns|language=en|access-date=2018-06-04}}</ref>
Also published while serving in Congress:
a. ‘U.S. Coal Reserves Key to National and Energy Security’
b.  ‘The Heritage Of Our Right To Bear Arms’
Saint Louis University Public Law Review”
